Description.p:
The WorkgroupRoleNameQualified vocabulary is used to support the qualifying of the WorkgroupRoleName vocabulary with the ResponderPriority vocab codeset
WorkgroupRoleNameQualified vocabulary requires the following:
A code from the WorkgroupRoleName vocabulary should be used
The OID to use is 2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.16.266
The
WorkgroupRoleName
vocabulary is found available on request.
To qualify the WorkgroupRoleName code with a responder priority code then the ResponderPriority vocabulary should be used as follows
A code from the ResponderPriority vocabulary should be used
The OID to use is 2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.17.495
The ResponderPriority
vocabulary is found available on request.
